attributes.action: ensure that the proposed £50bn loan swap to mortgage banks is included in the national debt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As of 19/04/08, it is reported that the Bank of England is about to offer to swap £50bn of government bonds for British bank mortgage debt, as reported by the BBC.

It seems that the intention is to use one year bonds, but roll them over for a total of three years. The sole reason for choosing this solution appears to be to massage the national debt figure, which does not include one year bonds (but would include three year bonds).

We petition the Prime Minister to ensure that this arrangement is admitted into the national debt regardless of its form, in order to avoid a serious impact on this country's reputation for honesty and integrity.
